ttp_template:
<group name="family_gateway_hostname_ip_address">
hostname: {{HOSTNAME | ORPHRASE}}
ip-address: {{IP_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
netmask: {{NETMASK | ORPHRASE}}
default-gateway: {{GATEWAY | ORPHRASE}}
ipv6-address: {{SERIAL | ORPHRASE}}
mac-address: {{MAC_ADDRESS | ORPHRASE}}
uptime: {{UPTIME | ORPHRASE}}
family: {{FAMILY | ORPHRASE}}
model: {{MODEL | ORPHRASE}}
vm-license: {{VM_LICENSE | ORPHRASE}}
vm-mode: {{VM_MODE | ORPHRASE}}
sw-version: {{OS | ORPHRASE}}
vpn-disable-mode: {{VPN_DISABLE_MODE | ORPHRASE}}
operational-mode: {{OPERATIONAL_MODE | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
